plan.summary: Add __eq__ and __hash__ methods to Todo class based on id field
implementation_sequence: 1. RED: Create failing tests for __eq__ and __hash__
2. GREEN: Implement __eq__ comparing by id only

acceptance_criteria.eq_same_id: Todo(id=1, text='a') == Todo(id=1, text='a') returns True - PASS
acceptance_criteria.neq_different_id: Todo(id=1, text='a') != Todo(id=2, text='a') returns True - PASS
acceptance_criteria.hash_consistent: hash(Todo) returns consistent value based on id - PASS

risks: Breaking change: Previous equality compared all fields; new equality compares only id
Todos with same id but different text/done will now be considered equal
